subject: Lockouts
Basketball
lead_paragraph: FIBA said it would clear N.B.A. players under contract to play in its leagues during the work stoppage, provided the deals they sign come with opt-out clauses so they can leave when the lockout ends.
snippet: FIBA said it would clear N.B.A. players under contract to play in its leagues during the work stoppage, provided the deals they sign come with opt-out clauses so they can leave when the lockout ends.
